product_name: Genuine Innovations 20g Threaded CO2 Cartridge - Single
long_description: The Genuine Innovations 20g threaded CO2 cartridge is ideal for inflating large-volume mountain bike tires such as 29ers, or even 2 700x23 road tires. Inflates a 29 x 2.1 in. tire up to 43psi (3.0 BAR), a 26 x 2.4 in. tire up to 32psi (2.2 BAR) or two 700x23 road tires up to 78psi (5.3 BAR). Cartridge is compatible with Genuine Innovations inflators: Ultraflate, Ultraflate Plus, Ultraflate Pro, Microflate, Air Chuck, SecondWind IH, SecondWind (all sold separately).
short_description: The Genuine Innovations 20g threaded CO2 cartridge is ideal for inflating large-volume mountain bike tires such as 29ers, or even 2 700x23 road tires.
